name: 張玉鈍
objective:
教學目標：
本課程旨在探討ERP之觀念、架構、要素與管理課題。
課程概述：
本課程將以標竿ERP軟體實作為基礎，認識企業資源規劃之架構、組成與企業基本流程，進而探討與ERP相關之管理課題, 如 企業經營模式(Business models)， 企業流程模式(Business Process Models)，ERP選擇，ERP 導入專案，ERP與企業電子化 ， 等。
Teaching Objective:
The course is concerned with concepts, framework, elements, and managerial issues of ERP.

Course Description:
The course will introduce the framework and elements of ERP and fundamental business processes through the actual practice on a benchmark ERP package. The managerial issues related to ERP such as Business models， Business Process Models，ERP selection， ERP implementation project ，ERP vs. e-Business will be covered.
